Package eu.iv4xr.ux.pxtesting.ltl

Class Area.RectangleArea

java.lang.Object
eu.iv4xr.ux.pxtesting.ltl.Area
eu.iv4xr.ux.pxtesting.ltl.Area.RectangleArea
Enclosing class:
Area
public static class Area.RectangleArea extends Area
An instance of Area that represent a rectangle-shaped area. The height of this area is just one voxel-size. So, a Rectangle-area of size w*h will have exactly w*h*1 voxels, assuming voxel-size of 1. Voxel-size is stored in the field Area.voxelSize.
Author:
Wish

    • top

      public eu.iv4xr.framework.spatial.Vec3 top
      The corner of the rectangle with the highest (x,-,z). It y-position should be the same as bottom.

    • flooredAltitude

      public float flooredAltitude
      A y coordinate (altitude) such that
      1. y = origin.y + k*voxelSize, for some integer k.
      2. y ≤ bottom.y
      3. y + voxelSize > bottom.y
      In other words, it is the closest altitude to bottom.y, which is a multiple of voxelsize, counting with respect to the world-origin.
